Package functionalities

This package contains the various functions of the application
Author:
gabri
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddImage
    Class used to add images to the album (From web or from local)
    AddWeb
    Class that creates a window where the user can input an url used to load an image
    EditCategory
    Class used to edit a category (Name, Description, Protection status)
    FullScreenView
    Class used to create a new window that displays the images of a category with their original size It has two buttons to explore the category and one button to create a slideshow of it
    LoadSave
    Class used to Load and Save a PhotoAlbum
    MergeCategories
    Class that merges two categories
    MoveImageTo
    Class that creates the MoveImageTo Window when the user presses the move button It has the list of the images of the category currently viewed and a list of the categories to which the image can be moved (the current category is not there obviously)
    NewCategory
    Window used to create a New Category (Protected or not)
    PasswordCheck
    Class that opens a Window when trying to use a protected category.
    RemoveCategory
    Class that creates the Remove Category Window when the user presses the remove button It has a list of the categories that can be removed from the selected album and the category icon is displayed on the left
    RemoveImage
    Class that creates the Remove Window when the user presses the remove button It has a list of images that can be removed from the selected category and the image is displayed on the left
    SlideShow
    Class used to create a Slideshow using the current category
    Status
    Class used to display the status of the app
